-- Anachronox / Pacifix / Crossroads --

Anachronox nods, "Alright." He follows Belthassan. As they walk 
through the walled corridors, Anachronox wonders how this base came 
to be. As they pass a fork in the passage, he ponders for a second on 
what the other passage lead to, "Belthassan, does that other passage 
lead to a storage bay or something? Also, how did... no, how was this 
ship created? It looks... odd." He frowns as he takes in the techno-
organic base.

--------------------------------

Pacifix is tapping his fingers on the console debating on what had 
happened to Firedrill, and what to do next. 

Hoist flickers into view beside him, "Pacifix."

Pacifix jumps, "Hoist!" says the surprised bot, "What's going on?"

Hoist frowns, "I've got an incomming comm from the Tripredacus... do 
you want to take it now?"

Pacifix nods, "Sure, patch them through."

Hoist nods. A beeping sound comes out of the speakers and Hoist 
says, "Ok, go." and flickers out of view. Daemos' voice comes 
through: "Pacifix, we have found out what was going on in our Renewal 
Chambers. The news I am about to deliver are not very encouraging...".

Pacifix nods to his diffuse friend. "Your words alone indicate that 
something is wrong... so what did you find out about Firedrill? Is he 
damaged or has something worst been discovered?" 

--------------------------------

"... and that is about it about our base. Make yourself at home, and 
feel free to ask as many questions as you'd like. Pacifix, Hoist, and 
I (most of the time) will be around to clear any questions you'll 
have up quickly and efficiently." Crossroads smiles to Gesper as he 
finishes the tour with a run-through of his quarters.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Belthassan smiled: Good! Now, follow me. I will introduce you to 
the 
> other Tripredacus.
> 
> He sends a mental signal to Daemos, telling him about what probably 
> happened to Firedrill and what Anachronox has done as of yet.
> 
> Daemos: I see... (He sighs heavily) Prophecy, open a frequency with 
> the Autobot base... (opens up) Pacifix, we have found out what was 
> going on in our Renewal Chambers. The news I am about to deliver 
are 
> not very encourageing...
